title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not identify rectangular solid 1, with the smallest surface area-to-volume ratio, as the cell with the smallest amount of plasma membrane per amount of cytoplasm.
The response identifies rectangular solid 1, with the smallest surface area-to-volume ratio, as the cell with the smallest amount of plasma membrane per amount of cytoplasm.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not describe that as the rectangles become longer, wider, and thinner, the surface area-to-volume ratio increases.
The response describes that as the rectangles become longer, wider, and thinner, the surface area-to-volume ratio increases.

title: Part C

descriptions: The response does not include any of the following criteria.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that folds and projections increase a cellâ€™s surface area-to-volume ratio without reducing cell size or changing the basic cell shape.
The response indicates that folds and projections produce cells with increased surface area-to-volume ratios without reducing cell size or changing the basic cell shape.
